rules.description: Make keypad_8 a virtual modifier (super key, space if pressed alone)
Make escape a virtual modifier
Make fn a virtual modifier (to work on external keyboards)
Change escape+right_command+h/l to command+option+left/right arrows (switch tabs)
Make escape an alias for control when combined with other alphanumerics or symbols
Make f-keys act perform special functions when combined with virtual fn key
Change right_command+hjkl to vim-style arrow keys
Change right_command+n/m to ctrl+e/y (vim scroll down/up)
Make right_command an alias for right_shift when combined with left-hand keys
Change super+qwerty row to symbol row
Change super+hjkl to tab/return/delete/option+delete
Change super+b to spacebar
Change super+[/] to {/}
Change super+backslash to caps lock
Change super+;/' to [/]
Change keypad_9 to underscore
Change super+n to plus
Change super+m to pipe
Change super+,/. to -/=
Change super+slash to backslash
Change keypad_4 to command+backtick (cycle through application windows)
Change keypad_5 to command+tab (switch to previous application)
Change super+g/keypad_5 to command+shift+tab/command+tab (app switcher left/right)
